PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Automatically updates the code in programmable blocks.
PluginData.Description:
This plugin automatically updates the code in programmable blocks whenever the corresponding Script.cs file changes.
More information: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-script-dev
Companion script merger and minifier tool: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-script-merge
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
Please consider supporting my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/semods
One time support via PayPal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/vferenczi/
Thank you!
